EmailTemplate.subject: It's time to renew!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Time to Renew! WE DON'T WANT TO LOSE YOU!
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
This is a friendly reminder that your renewal is due with One Reverse Mortgage Services, Please make sure to renew as soon as possible to avoid any disruption in your ability to:
- Access to the ORMS Portal to register new loans. - Receive exceptional support and knowledge from the ORMS team.
Please Submit
1. Most recent unaudited Balance Sheet and Profit and Loss Summary (Not applicable to Banks and Credit Unions) 2. Renewal Questionnaire (Attached)
The documents should be sent to ORMSRenewals@onereverse.com or reply to this email. We appreciate your partnership and look forward to future success with you.
Let's Get Started!
4445 Eastgate Mall, Ste 320, San Diego, CA 92121
